feed.title: Elsa Riachi
feed.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: The Structure of Adversarial Perturbations (Part I)

link.title: The Structure of Adversarial Perturbations (Part I)

entry.summary:
Adversarial vulnerability is a fundamental limitation of deep neural networks which remains poorly understood. Recent work suggests that adversarial attacks exploit the fact that non-robust models rely on superficial statistics to form predictions.
